info.title: Client-sided Navigator Protocol
info.description: Defines a protocol for the navigation and presentation of elements on the client's browser.

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element to receive the navigation handler

parameter.name: $target
parameter.description: The target value. According to W3C, the possible values are: - "_blank" - "_self" - "_parent" - "_top" - "[framename]"

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element to receive the navigation handler

parameter.name: $ref
parameter.description: The target's id to perform the action

parameter.name: $targetcontainer
parameter.description: The container's id of the group in which the target resides

parameter.name: $targetgroup
parameter.description: The group of the items to handle together when performing the action to the target. References the data-targetgroupid value

parameter.name: $navgroup
parameter.description: The group of navigation items, among which the handler element will be selected

parameter.name: $display
parameter.description: Defines the type of action for the rest items of the group. Accepted values: - "none" : hides all other items - "all" : shows all other items - "toggle" : toggles the appearance of the handler item

method.name: selector
method.description: Adds static navigation group selector (staticNav's targetgroup)

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The element to receive the selector
